text: Brothers & Sisters is the ninth studio album by pioneering jazz group Soil & "Pimp" Sessions, from Japan. It was released on September 3, 2014.http://www.jvcmusic.co.jp/soilpimp/ ==Track listing== ==Credits== *Performed and arranged by Soil & "Pimp" Sessions *Toasting [Agitator] – Shacho *Saxophone – Motoharu *Trumpet – Tabu Zombie *Piano – Josei *Bass – Akita Goldman *Drums – Midorin ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:Soil & "Pimp" Sessions albums
title: Brothers & Sisters (album)
